snippet: The vote on splitting Jamie Dimon’s roles at JPMorgan Chase could hinge on views about the lead director. | Bloomberg News admits its reporters viewed information about clients’ use of its terminals. | Representative Maxine Waters has adopted a...
abstract: The vote on splitting Jamie Dimon’s roles at JPMorgan Chase could hinge on views about the lead director. | Bloomberg News admits its reporters viewed information about clients’ use of its terminals. | Representative Maxine Waters has adopted a softer stance toward banks. | The Libor benchmark rate may be replaced with a two-track system.
